title: World Triathlon 2023 - Customs import formalities
description:
Accredited persons and accompanied luggages.

Declaration and authorisation of temporary admission and duty-free imports.

Communication of mandatory documents regarding the processing of specific goods (firearms, medicines, animals, etc).
zones: Ministère de l'Économie, des Finances et de la Souveraineté industrielle et numérique
siteWebUrl: Guide des douanes - JO/JP 2024 / site douane.gouv.fr

champDescriptors.label: I'm a minor or protected adult
Identity of the person legaly responsible
ID document of the person legaly responsible
Status
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the reason of your participation to the World Triathlon

champDescriptors.label: Departure country
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the country from which you are arriving.

champDescriptors.label: French adress
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the French adress where you will reside during the  World Triathlon.

champDescriptors.label: Final importation with duty relief
Do I carry goods destined to be permanently imported ?
Types of duty relief
champDescriptors.description: Tick the following boxes regarding the type of goods imported.
options: Pharmaceutical products used for an international sporting event

champDescriptors.label: Temporary Admission of goods
champDescriptors.description:
The temporary admission procedure allows total or partial exoneration of customs duties and taxes for goods imported temporarily from third countries and which will be re-exported in the same state.

Do not declare good which will be consumed.

champDescriptors.label: Do I have goods destined to be reexported ?
Reason of temporary importation
options: Material for the organisation of the event.

champDescriptors.label: Principal storage location
champDescriptors.description: Mention the principal storage location of the goods.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of goods
champDescriptors.description: Join the .pdf file regarding the inventory of imported goods in accordance with Annex 6.11 of the Customs and Freight Guide edited by the Paris 2024 Organising Committee for the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

champDescriptors.label: Psychotropic or narcotic drugs and medicaments
champDescriptors.description:
If you are an individual and are transporting psychotropic or narcotic drugs or substances for more than 3 months
 
If you are a doctor and transporting up to 10 units of narcotic substances.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of imported medicines, psychotropic or narcotif drugs
champDescriptors.description: If you are an individual, please bring a medical prescription in French or in English, which must be presented to the customs department in the event of a check on your arrival in France.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of imported medicines, psychotropic or narcotif drugs
champDescriptors.description: If you are a doctor, please attach an inventory of imported medicines, psychotropic or narcotif drugs in French or English.

champDescriptors.label: I come from Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway or Switzerland and import narcotics and psychotropic drugs
Certificate given by the country of origin
champDescriptors.description: If you are an individual coming from one of the country listed above, please bring the certificate given by the administration of the country of origin, which must be presented to the customs department in the event of a check on your arrival in France.

champDescriptors.label: I imported my animal
champDescriptors.description:
I come in France with my seeing-eye dog.

Please note: an original health certificate will be required for your pet upon arrival in France.

champDescriptors.label: I come from a listed country or not
options: United States of America (including Guam, American Samoa, Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico and U.S. Virgin Islands)
Ascension Island, BES Islands (Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba)
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Singapore

champDescriptors.label: Certificat of Rabies serum antibody titer tests
champDescriptors.description: If you don't come from one of the listed country, please attach the certificat of rabies serum antibody titer tests.
